Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit a game-tying home run in the first inning
The Dodgers rallied twice from early deficits
Post-Match Reflections: The Dodgers gave themselves life in the series
Shohei Ohtani embraced the moment he chose to sign for
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first postseason game for Ohtani
The Dodgers had not won a postseason game after trailing by three or more runs after the first inning in 14 attempts
Others: The Dodgers rallied twice from early deficits
Ohtani was in the middle of it all in the second rally
The Dodgers had a lead in a postseason game for the first time since Game 4 of the NLDS against the Padres
